Test Prep Registration Wizard
When you’re registering for test prep, there are so many numbers and dates to keep in mind. We’ve made it easy for you to find out when your student needs to start tutoring at Illini Tutoring, and when you need to submit your registration form.
Simply follow the Wizard’s prompts. After answering a few easy questions, you will be shown your student’s Test Prep start dates and registration deadline.
Which test are you taking?
Which test date are you preparing for?
Would you like to choose the amount of prep hours, or would you like us to calculate it for you based on your starting score and on the amount of points you want to add?
Choose Calculate
What is your starting score?
These calculations are just suggestions. Schedule a consultation with Illini Tutoring to find out our specific recommendations for your child.
How many points you want to add?
These calculations are just suggestions. Schedule a consultation with Illini Tutoring to find out our specific recommendations for your child.

How many hours of prep do you want to sign up for?
Based on the options you’ve selected, your student will need to begin test prep for the on on .
You need to register by . We schedule students in the order in which they registered - so we encourage you to register as soon as possible to avoid inconvenient tutoring times or to avoid being waitlisted! Students who register after the registration deadline will be scheduled if space allows. There is a $50 late registration fee.
Are you ready to register for test prep? Fill out the registration form.
